name: GymArc
description: Cross platform mobile application designed to allow users to track their gym workouts, view their previous workouts, create templates and plans, and view their progress.

name: Lie Detection Survey
description: A web application that allows users to create prompts and share them with participants. Each word in a prompt is shown to the participant one at a time at a speed predetermined by the creator to see the effects of speed on the participant's ability to detect lies.

name: Hermes
description: A web application for real-time communication between users. Users can create rooms and invite other users to join them.

name: Portfolio
description: My personal portfolio website. This very website you're looking at right now.
